00019 template <class T>
00020 class CalibrationSet;
00021 
00027 template <class T>
00028 class CalibrationSet {
00029 
00030 public:
00031   typedef std::map<unsigned,T*> CalibModuleMap;
00032   typedef std::pair<lcio::LCCollection*, CalibModuleMap*> CalibModuleData;
00033   typedef std::map<unsigned,CalibModuleData> CalibReadMap;
00034   
00035   CalibReadMap _readMap;
00036   TempModel* _tempModel;
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040   CalibrationSet(): _tempModel(0), _scalingFactor( 1 ) {
00041 };
00042 
00043   CalibrationSet(TempModel* tempModel): _tempModel(tempModel), _scalingFactor( 1 ) {
00044 };
00045 
00046 
00047 virtual ~CalibrationSet() {};
00048 
00049 
00050 bool empty() {
00051   return _readMap.empty();
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 void fill(lcio::LCCollection* calCol)
00056 {
00057   if (!calCol) return;
00058   unsigned _moduleID = calCol->getParameters().getIntVal("ModuleID");
00059 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00060   std::cout << "CalibrationSet<T>::fill(): adding ModuleID " << std::hex << _moduleID << std::dec << std::endl;
00061 #endif        
00062   typename CalibReadMap::iterator _mapIter = _readMap.find(_moduleID);
00063   if (_mapIter != _readMap.end()) {
00064     CalibModuleData _oldModuleData = _mapIter->second;
00065     CalibModuleMap* _oldModuleMap = _oldModuleData.second;
00066     delete _oldModuleMap;
00067   }
00068   CalibModuleMap* _moduleMap = new CalibModuleMap();
00069 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00070   std::cout << " adding CellKey ";
00071 #endif        
00072   for (int i=0; i< calCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++ ){        
00073     T* _obj = new T(calCol->getElementAt(i)); 
00074     _obj->setConstant( _scalingFactor * _obj->getConstant() );
00075     _obj->setConstantError( _scalingFactor * _obj->getConstantError() );
00076    _moduleMap->insert(std::make_pair(_obj->getCellKey(), _obj));
00077 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00078     std::cout << std::hex << _obj->getCellKey() << std::dec << " ";
00079 #endif        
00080   }
00081 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00082   std::cout << std::endl;
00083 #endif        
00084   CalibModuleData _moduleData = std::make_pair(calCol, _moduleMap);
00085   _readMap.insert(std::make_pair(_moduleID, _moduleData));
00086 }; 
00087 
00088 
00089 void fill(lcio::LCCollection* calCol, lcio::LCCollection* sroCol)
00090 {
00091   if (!calCol) return;
00092   unsigned _moduleID = calCol->getParameters().getIntVal("ModuleID");
00093 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00094   std::cout << "CalibrationSet<T>::fill(): adding ModuleID " << std::hex << _moduleID << std::dec << std::endl;
00095 #endif        
00096   typename CalibReadMap::iterator _mapIter = _readMap.find(_moduleID);
00097   if (_mapIter != _readMap.end()) {
00098     CalibModuleData _oldModuleData = _mapIter->second;
00099     CalibModuleMap* _oldModuleMap = _oldModuleData.second;
00100     delete _oldModuleMap;
00101   }
00102   CalibModuleMap* _moduleMap = new CalibModuleMap();
00103 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00104   std::cout << " adding CellKey ";
00105 #endif        
00106   for (int i=0; i< calCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++ ){        
00107     T* _obj = new T(calCol->getElementAt(i));
00108     _obj->setConstant( _scalingFactor * _obj->getConstant() );
00109     _obj->setConstantError( _scalingFactor * _obj->getConstantError() );
00110     if (sroCol && _tempModel) {
00111       float _tempValue = _tempModel->getTemp(sroCol, _moduleID, _obj->getCellKey());
00112       float _tempError = _tempModel->getTempError(sroCol, _moduleID, _obj->getCellKey());
00113       _obj->setCellTemp(_tempValue, _tempError);
00114     }  
00115     _moduleMap->insert(std::make_pair(_obj->getCellKey(), _obj));
00116 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00117     std::cout << std::hex << _obj->getCellKey() << std::dec << " ";
00118 #endif        
00119   }
00120 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00121   std::cout << std::endl;
00122 #endif        
00123   CalibModuleData _moduleData = std::make_pair(calCol, _moduleMap);
00124   _readMap.insert(std::make_pair(_moduleID, _moduleData));
00125 };
00126 
00127 
00128 T* getCalib(unsigned moduleID, unsigned cellKey)
00129 {
00130   typename CalibReadMap::const_iterator _mapIter = _readMap.find(moduleID);
00131   if (_mapIter == _readMap.end()) {
00132 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00133     std::cout << "CalibrationSet<T>::getCalib(): no moduleID " << std::hex << moduleID << std::dec << std::endl;
00134 #endif               
00135     return NULL;
00136   }
00137   CalibModuleMap* _ModuleMap = _mapIter->second.second;
00138   typename CalibModuleMap::iterator it = _ModuleMap->find(cellKey);
00139   if (it == _ModuleMap->end()) {
00140 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00141     std::cout << "CalibrationSet<T>::getCalib(): no cellKey " << std::hex << cellKey << " in module " << moduleID << std::dec << std::endl;
00142 #endif
00143     return NULL;
00144   }     
00145   return it->second;
00146 };
00147 
00148 // Simple wraper method to access calibration via module, chip, channel;
00149 // code from FastCaliceHit and HcalTileIndex
00150 T* getCalib(unsigned module, unsigned chip, unsigned channel)
00151 {
00152 
00153   short type = 0;
00154   if ( chip > 5 ) ++type;        //  lower part
00155   if ( module > 30 ) type += 2;  //  coarse modules
00156 
00157   int moduleID = ( module << 8 ) | type;
00158   int cellkey = (chip << 8) | channel;
00159 
00160   return this->getCalib(moduleID, cellkey);
00161 
00162 }
00163 
00164 void setTemp(lcio::LCCollection* sroCol)
00165 {
00166   if (!sroCol || !_tempModel) return;
00167   for (typename CalibReadMap::iterator _mapIter=_readMap.begin(); _mapIter!=_readMap.end(); _mapIter++) {
00168     CalibModuleMap* _ModuleMap=_mapIter->second.second;
00169     for (typename CalibModuleMap::iterator it=_ModuleMap->begin(); it!=_ModuleMap->end(); it++) {
00170       unsigned _moduleID = _mapIter->first;
00171       unsigned _cellKey = it->second->getCellKey();
00172       float _tempValue = _tempModel->getTemp(sroCol, _moduleID, _cellKey);
00173       float _tempError = _tempModel->getTempError(sroCol, _moduleID, _cellKey);
00174       it->second->setCellTemp(_tempValue, _tempError);
00175 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00176       std::cout << "CalibrationSet<T>::setTemperature(): " << _moduleID << "/ " << 
00177         std::hex << _cellKey << std::dec << ": " << _tempValue << "+-" << _tempError << std::endl;
00178       it->second->print(std::cout);   
00179 #endif
00180     }
00181   }
00182 };
00183 
00184 void applyScalingFactor( float f ){
00185   for ( typename CalibReadMap::iterator outIter = _readMap.begin(); 
00186         outIter != _readMap.end(); ++outIter ){
00187     CalibModuleMap* modmap = (*outIter).second.second;
00188     for ( typename CalibModuleMap::iterator inIter = modmap->begin();
00189           inIter != modmap->end(); ++inIter ){
00190       T* calobj = (*inIter).second;
00191       calobj->setConstant( f* calobj->getConstant() );
00192       calobj->setConstantError( f* calobj->getConstantError() );
00193     }
00194   }
00195 };
00196 
00197 void setScalingFactor( float f ){
00198   _scalingFactor = f;
00199 };
00200 
00201 private:
00202 float _scalingFactor;
00203 
00204 };
00205 
00206 }
